SELECT /* boardQuery.boardList */ * FROM BG_BOARD_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND USE_YN = 'Y'
AND BOARD_TYPE = #{board_type}

SELECT /* boardQuery.contentsDetail */ BBC.CONTENTS_ID , BBC.TITLE , BBC.CONTENTS , BBC.CONTENTS_CODE , (SELECT CODE_DETAIL FROM BG_CODE WHERE CODE = BBC.CONTENTS_CODE) AS CONTENTS_CODE_DESC , BBC.SUB_CONTENTS , BBC.HITS , BBC.IMG_PATH , CASE (BBC.STATUS) WHEN 0 THEN '준비' WHEN 1 THEN '진행중' WHEN 2 THEN '완료' ELSE '준비' END AS STATUS_DESC , BBC.EVENT_START_DT , BBC.EVENT_END_DT , BBC.MOD_DT , ifnull(BBC.STATUS, 1) AS STATUS , BM.MEMBER_ID , BM.MEMBER_NM , BM.MEMBER_EMAIL , BM.MEMBER_CEL FROM BG_BOARD_CONTENTS BBC, BG_MEMBER BM WHERE 1=1 AND BBC.MEMBER_ID = BM.MEMBER_ID AND BBC.CONTENTS_ID = #{board_contents_id}
SELECT /* boardQuery.commentList */ * FROM BG_BOARD_COMMENTS WHERE 1=1 AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND CONTENTS_ID = #{board_contents_id} ORDER BY COMMENT_ID DESC
SELECT /* boardQuery.commentDetail */ * FROM BG_BOARD_COMMENTS WHERE 1=1 AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND COMMENT_ID = #{comment_id}
